events.name: ev battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain for electric vehicle batteries involves various stages from raw material extraction to battery manufacturing and recycling, with significant global involvement.
events.description: The supply chain for electric vehicle batteries involves various stages from raw material extraction to battery manufacturing and recycling, with significant global involvement.

events.name: mining and material refining
events.wd_description: Key raw materials such as lithium, nickel, manganese, cobalt, graphite, copper, and aluminum are sourced from mineral-rich countries like China, Australia, South Africa, Canada, and Indonesia.
events.description: Key raw materials such as lithium, nickel, manganese, cobalt, graphite, copper, and aluminum are sourced from mineral-rich countries like China, Australia, South Africa, Canada, and Indonesia.

events.name: LIBs manufacturing
events.wd_description: China, Japan, and Korea dominate the LIB market, with major players including Panasonic Sanyo, AESC, LG Chem, and Samsung.
events.description: China, Japan, and Korea dominate the LIB market, with major players including Panasonic Sanyo, AESC, LG Chem, and Samsung.

events.name: global supply chain integration
events.wd_description: Globalization has integrated trade and manufacturing from various countries, creating a global supply chain for LIBs and other ESS components.
events.description: Globalization has integrated trade and manufacturing from various countries, creating a global supply chain for LIBs and other ESS components.

events.name: domestic manufacturing trend
events.wd_description: The trend of domestic manufacturing is rising due to trade imbalance, high unemployment rates, trade tensions, and supply chain vulnerability.
events.description: The trend of domestic manufacturing is rising due to trade imbalance, high unemployment rates, trade tensions, and supply chain vulnerability.

events.name: Indonesia's role in nickel supply
events.wd_description: Indonesia has a significant influence on the global nickel industry, with involvement in the LIBs supply chain through nickel mining and refining.
events.description: Indonesia has a significant influence on the global nickel industry, with involvement in the LIBs supply chain through nickel mining and refining.

events.name: kel ore export
events.wd_description: Indonesia exports raw nickel ore and matte nickel products as part of the LIBs supply chain.
events.description: Indonesia exports raw nickel ore and matte nickel products as part of the LIBs supply chain.

events.name: te nickel products
events.wd_description: Post-2017, Indonesia's involvement in the LIBs supply chain is through the export of matte nickel products and raw nickel ore refined by HPAL smelters.
events.description: Post-2017, Indonesia's involvement in the LIBs supply chain is through the export of matte nickel products and raw nickel ore refined by HPAL smelters.

events.name: L smelters
events.wd_description: High-Pressure Acid Leaching (HPAL) smelters process laterite ore into semi-finished materials needed for making LIBs.
events.description: High-Pressure Acid Leaching (HPAL) smelters process laterite ore into semi-finished materials needed for making LIBs.

events.name: tery component supply
events.wd_description: Indonesian nickel products are used in the LIBs supply chain, connected to at least 5 of the 10 largest LIB companies.
events.description: Indonesian nickel products are used in the LIBs supply chain, connected to at least 5 of the 10 largest LIB companies.
